author: crossley
msg: Improve description of "Legal Monitoring" task for "license header scan".

author: kahatlen
msg: This patch adds CROSS JOIN to the grammar and wires it into the
existing join machinery. It also adds test cases to verify that the
syntax is correctly understood, and it removes a negative test case
for CROSS JOIN from the db2Compatibility test.

author: dblevins
msg: Fix for OPENEJB-1062: StickyConnectionStrategy incorrectly caches connections

author: tv
msg: Intake will now support interfaces for the mapTo() method. Added a test to prove this. Fixes TRB-11
